overview: In a future world where the United States has seceded from the United Nations, Secret Agent Dan is tasked with hunting down the UN's nastiest enforcers. Today's target? A particularly colorful character posing as a German song parody artist by the name of Veird Albert. Or at least... Dan thinks he's posing.
tagline: An improv comedy with agency, filmed in its entirety during the 2022 Oscars!
title: Secret Hollywood Agent Recon Time
